name: Wealth Masters International Consulting
overview:
Wealth Masters International is a Financial Education product for people wanting to learn how to invest and grow their money. WMI was founded by Kip Herriage and Karl Bessey in 2005. The company has quickly turned into a multi-million dollar enterprise composed of over 4000 current members and sale associates. The success has been overwhelming due to their product line. The mPower wealth products teach users techniques, wealth management and investment strategies in a 100 day course. Wealth Masters has a yearly conference that attracts CEO’s of financial institutes and home business entrepreneurs with a mission to help them create financial plans and systems for their businesses.

Main Financial Topics - Weekly Webinars have included. -How to own and manage your personal bank? -Investment strategies in the recession. -Finding the right business opportunity. -Debt Management -Quick returns on investments. -Step-by-step plan that the master economist Kip Herriage utilizes.

Note: I find this company to has valuable products for people who have a yearly income of $75,000.00 and up. If you have overwhelming debt that is OK because the achademy is another financial product they have for people needing to gain control of their financial situations. Wealth Masters International starter kit provides over 20 audio, DVD’s, workbooks and a weekly financial consulting with a WMI representative.
